pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'functions for the routine handling and analysis of data collected by portable emissions measurement systems (PEMS) and other similar mobile monitoring systems' 'Functions for the Routine Handling and Analysis of Data Collected by Portable Emissions Measurement Systems (PEMS) and Other Similar Mobile Monitoring Systems' // The R package pems.utils contains functions for the routine handling and analysis of data from portable emissions measurement systems (PEMS) and other similar mobile monitoring systems. The current version, pems.utils 0.2, includes functions for data reading and importing, data cleanup, reformatting, alignment and merging, data visualization, screening and inspection, conditioning and sub- sampling, summary statistics calculation and analysis, and batch-wise analysis. The package also uses a dedicated 'pems' data class that manages many of the quality control, unit handling and data archiving issues that can sometimes hinder efforts to standardize PEMS research.
